frontmatter.title: The Importance of Being Seen
frontmatter.description: Being seen is one of the most powerful human needs and one of the most overlooked. In the age of smartphones even more so. I look back at the times when people saw me and just how much they affected me.
keywords: how to feel seen at work
genuine connection in a digital world
how to be present with others
how to be a better listener
